code: export function randomMaze(grid,startNode,finishNode,isThereStop){var stopNode=arguments.length>4&&arguments[4]!==undefined?arguments[4]:false;if(!startNode||!finishNode||startNode===finishNode){return false;}var walls=[];for(var row=0;row<grid.length;row++){for(var col=0;col<grid[0].length;col++){if(row===startNode.row&&col===startNode.col||row===finishNode.row&&col===finishNode.col||isThereStop&&row===stopNode.row&&col===stopNode.col)continue;if(Math.random()<0.33){walls.push([row,col]);}}}walls.sort(function(){return Math.random()-0.5;});return walls;}
